question_text: What is the fundamental concept of the GMDSS?
answer_one: GMDSS utilizes automated systems and satellite technology to improve emergency communications for the world's shipping industry.
answer_two: It is intended to automate and improve existing digital selective calling procedures and techniques.
answer_three: It is intended to provide more effective but lower cost commercial communications.
answer_four: It is intended to provide compulsory vessels with a collision avoidance system when they are operating in waters that are also occupied by non-compulsory vessels.

question_text: The primary purpose of the GMDSS is:
answer_one: Allow more effective control of SAR situations by vessels.
answer_two: Automate and improve emergency communications for the world's shipping industry.
answer_three: Provide additional shipboard systems for more effective company communications.
answer_four: Effective and inexpensive communications.

question_text: What is the basic concept of GMDSS?
answer_one: Shoreside authorities will rely on reports from nearby vessels to become aware of Distress alerts.

answer_three: SAR authorities ashore can be alerted to a Distress situation & shipping in the vicinity can be requested to participate in SAR operations.
